com.developmentontheedge.beans.swing.table

Class ColumnWithSort

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.developmentontheedge.beans.Option
      • com.developmentontheedge.beans.swing.table.Column
        • com.developmentontheedge.beans.swing.table.ColumnWithSort
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PropertyChangeObservable, Serializable

    public class ColumnWithSort
extends Column
    This class is used for creating of columns that represent sortable series of data
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • ColumnWithSort

        public ColumnWithSort(Option parent,
                      String columnKey,
                      String name,
                      boolean enabled,
                      int sorting)
        Creates column description with specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        parent - parent for notification about changes.
        columnKey - name used to access the column data.
        name - display name, used for labelling of the columns in the table header.
        enabled - specifies whether this column will be visible.
        sorting - sort order for the data in this column. Should be one of SORTING_NONE,SORTING_ASCENT,SORTING_DESCENT.
